timeline.message:
Fixes #4542 Root pathspec mapping pathInfo

For the "" root pathspec, the pathinfo should always be the full path and the matched path is ""

Signed-off-by: Greg Wilkins <gregw@webtide.com>

timeline.bodyText: That comment isn't true now, is it?
timeline.author: janbartel

timeline.bodyText:
This comment should really go on the PathSpecGroup class, but as it isn't part of the PR I'm putting this comment here instead.
The comments at PathSpecGroup class line 38-42 need fixing I think as they don't contain enough explanation and have contradictory values.
timeline.author: janbartel
